name: Return of the Rabbit God
description:
Inspired by the Chinese deity Tu'er Shen.
The Rabbit God received prayers from three men in need of his guidance.
Three short stories - two with multiple endings, one kinetic.

Content warning: Wu's story contains topics involving homophobia.

Credits:

Filthy Silver - Writer
1ke_soda - Sprite artist, title screen artist, character designer
Exuin - Programmer, background artist, character designer
Grim - Character designer / concept artist
